required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Double Regional Anesthesia in Video Assisted Thoracoscopy
clinical_study.official_title: Double Regional Anesthesia in Video Assisted Thoracoscopy

brief_summary.textblock: Monocentric, randomized, controlled, single-blind study who's aim is to demonstrate the efficacy of the association of paravertebral block and serratus plane block with paravertebral block alone

secondary_outcome.measure: Length of stay in recovery room

arm_group.arm_group_label: Serratus plane block with paravertebral block
arm_group.description: Association of Serratus plane block and paravertebral block for anesthesia

intervention.intervention_name: Serratus plane block and paravertebral block
intervention.description: Single Administration of 20 mL of ropivacaine for Serratus plane block (Intra-muscular injection) followed by a single administration of 20 ml ropivacaine for paravertebral block (T4 inter-vertebral injection)
intervention.arm_group_label: Serratus plane block with paravertebral block

intervention.description: Single Administration of 20 ml of ropivacaine for paravertebral block (T4 inter-vertebral injection)
